explanation: The cited clause only states that the Disclosing Party has no obligation to provide or update Confidential Information. It does not expressly state that neither party is obligated to enter into any further agreement or transaction, which is the specific clarification required by the rule.
rule: Clarify that the NDA does not obligate either party to enter into any further agreement or transaction.
exampleLanguage: This Agreement does not obligate either party to enter into any further agreement or transaction.
